inclusion.criterion: Spouse of woman diagnosed with stage 0, I, II or III breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Spouses and patients must be married or cohabiting for at least 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Spouses and patients must have English as one of their languages of choice
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Spouses and patients must live within 25 miles of the University of Washington (UW) study center
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Spouses/partners must be willing to give a sample of blood and/or sputum at time of first and second data collections
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Woman diagnosed with stage IV or recurrent breast cancer
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Woman and/or spouse not able to read and write in English
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion, tested positive for HPV 16, smokes and drinks alcohol frequently.
